import React, { useRef } from "react"; import styles from './UseForm.module.css'; const UserForm = () => { const enteredCardName = useRef(); const enteredCardNumber = useRef(); const enteredCardMonth = useRef(); const enteredCardYear = useRef(); const enteredCardCvv = useRef(); const submitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const name = enteredCardName.current.value; const number = enteredCardNumber.current.value; } return








} export default UserForm;
